title: 08/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin's excited for the football season but everyone needs to slow down on hyping up Patrick Mahomes as a Hall of Famer. The simple fix in Green Bay would be allowing Aaron Rodgers to feel more involved with personnel. LeBron James claps back on social media to all the doubters & haters about the Lakers being one of the oldest teams. Plus, Colin decides which NFL stars are already Hall of Famers!


Guest: Joe Theismann

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
